name: Filter Search
overview: Adds search functionality to Jellyfin filter dialogs
description: Adds search functionality to filter dialogs (tags, genres, studios, etc.) and displays enabled/checked filters at the top of the list.

versions.changelog:
For Jellyfin 10.11.x
- Build fix: correctly compiled with .NET 9 for Jellyfin 10.11.x
- Hidden dialog operations: filter removal from the active bar no longer flashes the dialog
- Improved filter bar padding: active filters bar no longer stretches edge-to-edge

For Jellyfin 10.10.x
- Build fix: correctly compiled with .NET 8 for Jellyfin 10.10.x
- Hidden dialog operations: filter removal from the active bar no longer flashes the dialog
- Improved filter bar padding: active filters bar no longer stretches edge-to-edge

For Jellyfin 10.11.x
- Hidden dialog operations: filter removal from the active bar no longer flashes the dialog
- Improved filter bar padding: active filters bar no longer stretches edge-to-edge

For Jellyfin 10.10.x
- Hidden dialog operations: filter removal from the active bar no longer flashes the dialog
- Improved filter bar padding: active filters bar no longer stretches edge-to-edge

For Jellyfin 10.11.x
- Fixed Select All/None buttons overwhelming the server (now sequential with delay)
- Added progress indicator during bulk selection
- Fixed active filter bar now captures filters from dialog
- Clear All button properly opens filter dialog and clears filters

For Jellyfin 10.10.x
- Fixed Select All/None buttons overwhelming the server (now sequential with delay)
- Added progress indicator during bulk selection
- Fixed active filter bar now captures filters from dialog
- Clear All button properly opens filter dialog and clears filters
